product_name: Seattle Sports Blazer White Front Bike Light
long_description: Seattle Sports Blazer White Front bike light offers a quick-mounting design and bright LEDs to alert others to your presence when you're riding. 2 white LED bulbs put out a maximum of 20 lumens and can be set to 1 of 3 modes: fast strobe, slow strobe and constant. Replaceable CR2032 lithium ion battery offers up to 180 hrs. of run time. Water-resistant, slim, flexible and finish-friendly silicone body of the Seattle Sports Blazer White Front bike light stretches around handlebar for easy mounting.
short_description: Seattle Sports Blazer White Front bike light offers a quick-mounting design and bright LEDs to alert others to your presence when you're riding.
